00066 struct lu_env *cl_inode_fini_env;
00067 __u16 cl_inode_fini_refcheck;
00068 
00073 static DEFINE_MUTEX(cl_inode_fini_guard);
00074 
00075 int cl_setattr_ost(struct cl_object *obj, const struct iattr *attr,
00076                    unsigned int attr_flags)
00077 {
00078         struct lu_env *env;
00079         struct cl_io  *io;
00080         int            result;
00081         __u16          refcheck;
00082 
00083         ENTRY;
00084 
00085         env = cl_env_get(&refcheck);
00086         if (IS_ERR(env))
00087                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(env));
00088 
00089         io = vvp_env_thread_io(env);
00090         io->ci_obj = obj;
00091         io->ci_verify_layout = 1;
00092 
00093         io->u.ci_setattr.sa_attr.lvb_atime = LTIME_S(attr->ia_atime);
00094         io->u.ci_setattr.sa_attr.lvb_mtime = LTIME_S(attr->ia_mtime);
00095         io->u.ci_setattr.sa_attr.lvb_ctime = LTIME_S(attr->ia_ctime);
00096         io->u.ci_setattr.sa_attr.lvb_size = attr->ia_size;
00097         io->u.ci_setattr.sa_attr_flags = attr_flags;
00098         io->u.ci_setattr.sa_valid = attr->ia_valid;
00099         io->u.ci_setattr.sa_parent_fid = lu_object_fid(&obj->co_lu);
00100 
00101 again:
00102         if (cl_io_init(env, io, CIT_SETATTR, io->ci_obj) == 0) {
00103                 struct vvp_io *vio = vvp_env_io(env);
00104 
00105                 if (attr->ia_valid & ATTR_FILE)
00106                         /* populate the file descriptor for ftruncate to honor
00107                          * group lock - see LU-787 */
00108                         vio->vui_fd = LUSTRE_FPRIVATE(attr->ia_file);
00109 
00110                 result = cl_io_loop(env, io);
00111         } else {
00112                 result = io->ci_result;
00113         }
00114         cl_io_fini(env, io);
00115         if (unlikely(io->ci_need_restart))
00116                 goto again;
00117 
00118         cl_env_put(env, &refcheck);
00119         RETURN(result);
00120 }
00121 
00131 int cl_file_inode_init(struct inode *inode, struct lustre_md *md)
00132 {
00133         struct lu_env        *env;
00134         struct ll_inode_info *lli;
00135         struct cl_object     *clob;
00136         struct lu_site       *site;
00137         struct lu_fid        *fid;
00138         struct cl_object_conf conf = {
00139                 .coc_inode = inode,
00140                 .u = {
00141                         .coc_layout = md->layout,
00142                 }
00143         };
00144         int result = 0;
00145         __u16 refcheck;
00146 
00147         LASSERT(md->body->mbo_valid & OBD_MD_FLID);
00148         LASSERT(S_ISREG(inode->i_mode));
00149 
00150         env = cl_env_get(&refcheck);
00151         if (IS_ERR(env))
00152                 return PTR_ERR(env);
00153 
00154         site = ll_i2sbi(inode)->ll_site;
00155         lli  = ll_i2info(inode);
00156         fid  = &lli->lli_fid;
00157         LASSERT(fid_is_sane(fid));
00158 
00159         if (lli->lli_clob == NULL) {
00160                 /* clob is slave of inode, empty lli_clob means for new inode,
00161                  * there is no clob in cache with the given fid, so it is
00162                  * unnecessary to perform lookup-alloc-lookup-insert, just
00163                  * alloc and insert directly. */
00164                 LASSERT(inode->i_state & I_NEW);
00165                 conf.coc_lu.loc_flags = LOC_F_NEW;
00166                 clob = cl_object_find(env, lu2cl_dev(site->ls_top_dev),
00167                                       fid, &conf);
00168                 if (!IS_ERR(clob)) {
00169                         /*
00170                          * No locking is necessary, as new inode is
00171                          * locked by I_NEW bit.
00172                          */
00173                         lli->lli_clob = clob;
00174                         lu_object_ref_add(&clob->co_lu, "inode", inode);
00175                 } else
00176                         result = PTR_ERR(clob);
00177         } else {
00178                 result = cl_conf_set(env, lli->lli_clob, &conf);
00179         }
00180 
00181         cl_env_put(env, &refcheck);
00182 
00183         if (result != 0)
00184                 CERROR("Failure to initialize cl object "DFID": %d\n",
00185                        PFID(fid), result);
00186         return result;
00187 }
00188 
00198 static void cl_object_put_last(struct lu_env *env, struct cl_object *obj)
00199 {
00200         struct lu_object_header *header = obj->co_lu.lo_header;
00201         wait_queue_t           waiter;
00202 
00203         if (unlikely(atomic_read(&header->loh_ref) != 1)) {
00204                 struct lu_site *site = obj->co_lu.lo_dev->ld_site;
00205                 struct lu_site_bkt_data *bkt;
00206 
00207                 bkt = lu_site_bkt_from_fid(site, &header->loh_fid);
00208 
00209                 init_waitqueue_entry(&waiter, current);
00210                 add_wait_queue(&bkt->lsb_marche_funebre, &waiter);
00211 
00212                 while (1) {
00213                         set_current_state(TASK_UNINTERRUPTIBLE);
00214                         if (atomic_read(&header->loh_ref) == 1)
00215                                 break;
00216                         schedule();
00217                 }
00218 
00219                 set_current_state(TASK_RUNNING);
00220                 remove_wait_queue(&bkt->lsb_marche_funebre, &waiter);
00221         }
00222 
00223         cl_object_put(env, obj);
00224 }
00225 
00226 void cl_inode_fini(struct inode *inode)
00227 {
00228         struct lu_env           *env;
00229         struct ll_inode_info    *lli  = ll_i2info(inode);
00230         struct cl_object        *clob = lli->lli_clob;
00231         __u16  refcheck;
00232         int emergency;
00233 
00234         if (clob != NULL) {
00235                 void                    *cookie;
00236 
00237                 cookie = cl_env_reenter();
00238                 env = cl_env_get(&refcheck);
00239                 emergency = IS_ERR(env);
00240                 if (emergency) {
00241                         mutex_lock(&cl_inode_fini_guard);
00242                         LASSERT(cl_inode_fini_env != NULL);
00243                         cl_env_implant(cl_inode_fini_env, &refcheck);
00244                         env = cl_inode_fini_env;
00245                 }
00246 
00247                 /*
00248                  * cl_object cache is a slave to inode cache (which, in turn
00249                  * is a slave to dentry cache), don't keep cl_object in memory
00250                  * when its master is evicted.
00251                  */
00252                 cl_object_kill(env, clob);
00253                 lu_object_ref_del(&clob->co_lu, "inode", inode);
00254                 cl_object_put_last(env, clob);
00255                 lli->lli_clob = NULL;
00256                 if (emergency) {
00257                         cl_env_unplant(cl_inode_fini_env, &refcheck);
00258                         mutex_unlock(&cl_inode_fini_guard);
00259                 } else {
00260                         cl_env_put(env, &refcheck);
00261                 }
00262 
00263                 cl_env_reexit(cookie);
00264         }
00265 }
00266 
00269 __u64 cl_fid_build_ino(const struct lu_fid *fid, int api32)
00270 {
00271         if (BITS_PER_LONG == 32 || api32)
00272                 RETURN(fid_flatten32(fid));
00273         else
00274                 RETURN(fid_flatten(fid));
00275 }
00276 
00280 __u32 cl_fid_build_gen(const struct lu_fid *fid)
00281 {
00282         __u32 gen;
00283         ENTRY;
00284 
00285         if (fid_is_igif(fid)) {
00286                 gen = lu_igif_gen(fid);
00287                 RETURN(gen);
00288         }
00289 
00290         gen = (fid_flatten(fid) >> 32);
00291         RETURN(gen);
00292 }
